mapper.select: SELECT pb.prj_name, pb.pm_name, pb.prj_start, pb.prj_end FROM project_mapping pm JOIN project_basic pb ON pb.prj_num = pm.prj_num JOIN employee e ON pm.emp_num = e.emp_num WHERE pb.deleted_yn = 'n' GROUP BY pb.prj_name;
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, addr3 = #{addr3}, pos = #{pos}, dept = #{dept}, career = #{career}, emp_level = #{emp_level}, cert = #{cert}, file_name = #{file_name} WHERE emp_num = 1
